GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
bfq: Update cgroup information before merging bio

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit b06691af08b41dfd81052a3362514d9827b44bb1, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit e21b7a0b988772e82e7147e1c659a5afe2ae003c. For more details please see the references link.
